source_string:
The type of "accurate placement protocol" to use.
- Auto: Uses v3 in single player, and by default Slabs-only in multiplayer,
  unless the server has Carpet mod that sends a 'carpet:hello'
  packet, in which case v2 is used on that server.
- Version 3: Only supported by Litematica itself (in single player) or with Servux.
- Version 2: Compatible with servers with the Carpet mod
  (either QuickCarpet by skyrising and DeadlyMC,
  or CarpetExtra in addition to FabricCarpet.
  And in both cases the 'accurateBlockPlacement' Carpet rule needs
  to be enabled on the server).
- Slabs only: Only fixes top slabs. Compatible with Paper servers.
- None: Does not modify coordinates.
translation:
要使用的§6[简单放置协议]§f的类型. 
-Version 3:仅支持 Litematica 本身(在单人游戏中). 
-Version 2:兼容Carpet mod. 
- Slabs only: 只修复top slabs.兼容Paper servers.
- 关闭: 不做调整

source_string:
Whether or not the NBT data of blocks is attempted to be restored,
and which method is used for that.
- Place & Data Modify will try to place the "NBT-picked" block
  near the player, and then use the data modify
  command to transfer the NBT data to the setblock'ed block
- Place & Clone will try to place the "NBT-picked" block
  near the player, and then clone it to the final location.
- Teleport & Place will try to teleport the player nearby and then
  directly place the NBT-picked item in the correct position.
Note that the teleport & place method doesn't currently work correctly/at all.
The recommended method is §ePlace & Data Modify§r, however for that to work
you will probably need to lower the pasteCommandLimit to 1 per tick and increase
the pasteCommandInterval to 1-4 ticks or something.
Thus you should only use this for pasting important blocks that need the data,
for example by making a schematic of just the inventories,
and then paste that with replace behavior set to None.
translation:
需要用何种方法尝试恢复方块 NBT 数据? 
- Place & Data Modify, 会把带 NBT 的方块放在玩家附近后 
  用 data modify 指令转换这些用 setblock 放的方块 
- Place & Clone, 会尝试放置带 NBT 方块在玩家附近然后 
  用 clone 指令复制到最终位置 
- Teleport & Place, 会尝试 tp 到附近位置然后直接在 
  正确的位置放下带 NBT 方块 
请注意 Teleport & Place 方法现在不太好用甚至完全用不了.  
建议的方法是 Place & Data Modify, 然而要让这种方法生效 
得降低粘贴命令限制到 1/tick 并将粘贴间隔增加到  
1-4 个 tick 或者调别的什么东西 
因此你只应当用这种方法粘贴需要迁移数据的重要方块.  
例如, 做了包含库存内容的原理图,  
然后在替换规则被设置为 None 的时候粘贴原理图

source_string:
The behavior of replacing existing blocks
in the Paste schematic tool mode
translation: 在粘贴原理图工具模式中替换现有块的方式

source_string:
The block replace behavior when adding blocks
to the schematic world.

This allows using overlapped placements without the
later handled placement always overwriting earlier ones with air.
On the other hand some blocks like light blocks are considered
to be air, so they would need the "All" replace behavior
to get placed at all.
translation:
当原理图粘贴时, 方块的替换方式
这将会允许直接改变重叠的位置, 
而不需要后面处理的位置总是先用空气覆盖前面的位置. 
另一方面, 一些像光照方块这样的方块被认为是空气, 
所以它们需要"All"替换行为来放置

source_string:
Selects which type of warning message to show (if any)
when either the Easy Place mode or Placement Restriction prevent placing a block
translation:
当简单放置模式或放置限制阻止玩家放置一个方块时, 
选择要显示的警告信息类型
-物品栏模式: 显示在物品栏上方
-消息模式: 橙色的弹出消息样式

source_string: The Area Selection corners mode to use (Corners, or Expand)
translation: 要使用的区域选择模式(角点, 或展开)

source_string:
If enabled, then the directory set in 'customSchematicBaseDirectory'
will be used as the root/base schematic directory,
instead of the normal '.minecraft/schematics/' directory
translation:
如果启用该功能, 则在§6[自定义原理图目录]§f
中设置的目录路径将用为原理图的根目录, 
而不是正常的§1 .minecraft/schematics/ §r目录

source_string:
The root/base schematic directory to use,
if 'customSchematicBaseDirectoryEnabled' is enabled
translation:
如果启用了自定义原理图目录
所要使用的原理图的根目录

source_string:
Use per-world or server root directories for the area selections
§6NOTE: Don't switch this OFF while you are live streaming,
§6as then the Area Selection browser will show the server IP
§6in the navigation widget and also in the current selection name/path
§6until you change the current directory and selection again
translation:
使用每个世界或服务器根目录进行区域选择
§6注意: 直播时请勿关闭此功能, 
§6否则区域选择浏览器将显示服务器 IP
§6在指南以及当前选择名称/路径中
§6直到您再次更改当前目录和选择

source_string:
If enabled, then the schematic rendering is done
by injecting the different render call into the vanilla
rendering code. This should result in better translucent block
rendering/ordering and schematic blocks not getting rendered
through the client world blocks/terrain.
If the rendering doesn't work (for example with Optifine),
try disabling this option.
translation:
如果启用, 那么结构图的渲染将通过使用不同的渲染调用注入到原版渲染代码中. 
这应该可以改善透明方块的渲染/排序, 
并且避免结构图中的方块穿过客户端世界的方块/地形被渲染. 
如果渲染不起作用(例如在使用 Optifine 时), 请尝试禁用此选项

source_string:
If true, then the selected corner of an area selection
is always set to the last moved corner,
when using the set corner hotkeys
translation:
如果启用, 那么在使用角点模式进行区域选择时
区域选择的角总是被设置为最后选择的角
(最后选择的角就是角点的框线与面都有颜色)
(PS: 虽然在实际使用过程当中没有太大影响)

source_string:
If enabled, then using the Clone Selection hotkey will create
the placement at the original area selection position,
instead of at the player's current position
translation:
如果启用, 那么使用克隆快捷键时
将在原来选择的区域位置克隆, 
而不是在玩家的当前位置

source_string:
If enabled, then command feedback is automatically disabled
and then re-enabled for multiplayer Paste, Fill and Delete operations
(which are using /setblock and /fill commands) by disabling and then
re-enabling the sendCommandFeedback game rule when the task is finished
translation:
如果启用, 命令反馈将被自动禁用, 
然后在多人游戏中的粘贴, 填充和删除操作
(使用 /setblock 和 /fill命令)将没有反馈, 
即在仅仅在任务开始时禁用 sendCommandFeedback 游戏规则
在任务结束时重新启用 sendCommandFeedback 游戏规则

source_string:
The maximum size/volume of each individual box
that can be filled via the command-based Fill/Delete
operations. Bigger areas/volumes will get split to multiple commands.
All areas are also split to per-chunk boxes at first anyway.
translation:
可以通过命令填充/删除操作更改的每个单独框的最大的大小/体积. 
更大的区域/体积将被分割为多个命令去执行. 
但无论如何, 所有区域在一开始也被分割为多个区块

source_string:
Disables dividing the fill volumes (in the Fill, Replace and Delete modes)
to per-chunk boxes
translation:
禁用将填充体积划分为子区块
(在填充、替换和删除模式下)
效果: 填充、替换和删除操作在功能开启前是按子区块操作的
开启功能候是直接批量删
(样本较少没有看出是什么方式)

source_string:
Maximum number of commands sent per game tick,
when using the Paste, Fill and Delete features on a server,
where they will use setblock and fill commands.
Note that he Paste feature can overshoot this by a couple of commands
when using the NBT restore functionality, which needs two additional commands for each block.
translation:
当玩家在服务器上使用粘贴, 填充和删除功能时, 他们将使用 setblock 和 fill 指令, 
该变量控制每个游戏周期所发送的最大指令数. 请注意, 在使用 NBT 恢复功能时, 
粘贴功能可能会因几个命令而失败, 这需要为每个块添加两个额外的指令

source_string:
The clone command name to use when using the
command-based creative mode functionality on servers.
This is currently only used by the Paste function if the NBT restore
behavior is set to 'Place & Clone'.
translation:
在服务器的创造模式中使用 clone 命令时要使用的 clone 命令名
如果 NBT 迁移选项设置为「Place & Clone」, 则当前功能仅使用粘贴

source_string:
The fill command name to use when using the
command-based creative mode functionality on servers
translation: 在服务器的创造模式中使用 fill 命令时要使用的 fill 命令名

source_string:
The setblock command name to use when using the
command-based creative mode functionality on servers,
namely the Paste Schematic in World function
translation:
在服务器的创造模式中使用 setblock 命令时要使用的
setblock 命令名, 即在世界上粘贴原理图功能

source_string:
The summon command name to use when using the
command-based creative mode functionality on servers,
namely the Paste Schematic in World function
translation:
在服务器的创造模式中使用Summon 命令时要使用的
Summon 命令名, 即在世界上粘贴原理图功能

source_string:
The interval in game ticks the Paste, Fill and Delete tasks
are executed at. The commandLimitPerTick config sets the maximum
number of commands to send per execution, and this config
sets the interval in game ticks before the next execution.
translation:
游戏中的粘贴, 填充和删除任务的 tick 间隔. 
commandLimitPerTick 配置设置每次执行发送的命令的最大数量, 
这个变量配置下一次执行命令之前的游戏时间间隔

source_string:
If enabled, instead of using the configured setblock and fill commands,
the World Edit //pos1, //pos2 and //set commands are used.
Note that using World Edit commands is around 3x slower
than using vanilla commands due to the command limit per tick,
and WE requiring multiple commands per block or area (//pos1 //pos2 //set).
§6WARNING: The paste replace behavior option WILL NOT WORK if using
§6the World Edit commands and fill volumes instead of individual setblock commands!
Thus it's recommended to use the vanilla commands, if you have the permission to run them.
One other thing that might make you prefer WE commands in some cases
is that they can prevent block updates, if the server doesn't have
the Carpet mod and thus the '/carpet fillUpdates false' rule available.
translation:
如果启用该功能, 而不是使用已经配置的 setblock 或 fill 命令, 
则使用 World Edit 的 //pos1、//pos2 和 //set 命令. 
注意, 使用 WorldEdit 指令会比正常粘贴大约慢 3 倍
且由于每 tick 的命令限制, 比起使用普通命令, 
我们需要每个块或区域执行多个命令(//pos1 //pos2 //set). 
§6警告: 如果使用 WorldEdit 指令或 fill 命令而不是单独的 setblock 命令! 
§6粘贴与替换功能将无法使用! 
因此, 如果您有权限运行它们, 建议使用普通命令. 
另一件让你在某些情况下更喜欢使用 WE 命令的事情是, 
如果服务器没有 Carpet mod 所导致的「/Carpet fillUpdates false」
规则不可用时, 可以使用该功能防止方块更新

source_string:
Enables some debug log messages in the game console,
for debugging certain issues or crashes.
translation: 在游戏控制台中启用一些调试日志消息, 用于调试某些问题或崩溃

source_string:
The configurable data fixer level to apply to loaded schematics.
This option can improve performance of loading
schematics by bypassing the Vanilla Data Fixer,
but this can also cause severe data loss if it is disabled.
translation:
可配置的数据修正器级别, 用于应用于加载的结构图. 
此选项可以通过绕过原版数据修正器来提高加载结构图的性能, 但如果禁用它, 可能会导致严重的数据丢失

source_string:
Default Schema Value for the Vanilla Data Fixer

Used to adjust the lowest possible value, and the value used
when the loaded schematic does not contain this information.

§6WARNING:  This setting is meant to be used at the direction
§6from a Litematica developer such as masa themselves.
§6When in doubt, keep the default for Minecraft 1.12.
translation:
用于 Vanilla 数据修正器的默认架构值

用于调整最低可能值, 以及当加载的结构图不包含此信息时使用的值. 

§6警告: 此设置应按照 Litematica 开发者(如 masa 本人)的指导使用. 
§6如果不确定, 请保持 Minecraft 1.12 的默认值

source_string:
This causes the Easy Place mode to place the first/closest block
you are looking at first, instead of the furthest/bottom-most block.
Setting this to false allows you to place multiple layers "at once",
since the furthest blocks would be placed before the closer ones block the line of sight.
translation:
这将使得简单放置模式放置你首先看到的方块
而不是最远的方块, 设置为关闭将可以放置多层
因为是由远到近放置

source_string:
When enabled, then you can hold down the use key
and look at different schematic blocks to place them,
without having to click on every block individually.
translation:
启用后, 您可以按住使用键
根据投影以放置它们, 
而无需单独点击每个方块

source_string:
When enabled, then simply trying to use an item/place a block
on schematic blocks will place that block in that position
translation: 启用后, 只需根据投影以放置它们

source_string:
If enabled, then Litematica handles the so called
"Carpet mod Accurate Block Placement Protocol" itself in single player.
This is recommended to be kept enabled if you
are going to use Easy Place in single player.
translation:
如果启用该功能, 那么投影将在单人游戏中采用[精确放置协议]. 
如果你打算在单人游戏中使用简单放置, 建议保持启用

source_string:
The interval in milliseconds the Easy Place mode waits
after swapping inventory slots and placing a block.
Useful to avoid placing wrong blocks when having high ping.
translation: 简单放置模式在背包和手中块交换后等待的间隔(以毫秒为单位). 有效避免因为高 ping 放置错误的方块

source_string: Swing the Player's hand when using Easy Place.
translation: 使用简易放置功能时, 是否挥动玩家的手

source_string:
If enabled, reduces reach distance from +1.0 to the
Vanilla value so servers don't reject placement of
far blocks.
translation:
如果启用, 手长将从 6 改为 4.5
服务器便不会拒绝放置方块

source_string:
Use the Entity Data Sync protocol from Servux
to obtain Entity Data from the server
translation: 使用 Servux 的实体数据同步协议, 从服务器获取实体数据

source_string:
Use the Vanilla NBT Query method when Servux
is not available.  This method requires Operator Privileges.
translation: 当 Servux 不可用时, 使用原版 NBT 查询方法. 此方法需要管理员权限

source_string:
Require holding an enabled tool item
for the executeOperation hotkey to work
translation: 需要持有已启用的工具项以使 §6[执行操作]§f 热键工作

source_string: Enable a fix to the broken chest mirror code in vanilla
translation: 修复投影中破碎的大箱子

source_string:
If true, then a fix is applied for the vanilla bug in rails,
where the 180 degree rotations of straight north-south and
east-west rails rotate 90 degrees counterclockwise instead >_>
translation:
如果为真, 那么就对轨道中常见的 Bug 进行了修正, 
即南北方向和东西方向的直线轨道 180 度旋转时逆时针旋转90度, 而不是 >_>
应该是对于轨道显示做了调整

source_string:
If enabled, then by default the suggested schematic names
will be lowercase and using underscores instead of spaces
translation: 如果启用, 则默认情况下建议的原理图名称将为小写并使用下划线而不是空格

source_string:
When enabled, highlights the item (including Shulker Boxes containing it)
of the looked at block in the schematic
translation:
当启用时, 背包内高亮显示指向原理图的方块
(无论是物品栏还是潜影盒)

source_string:
Bypass the new distance/coordinate check that was added in 1.18.2.

That check breaks the "accurate placement protocol" and causes
any blocks placed with a rotation (or other property) request to just become ghost blocks.

There is basically no need to ever disable this.
The check didn't even exist ever before 1.18.2.
translation:
该功能绕过了 1.18.2 中新添加的距离/坐标校验. 
该校验破坏了§6[精确放置协议]§f的功能
并导致任何带有旋转(或其他属性)
请求放置的方块变成了幽灵方块
基本上没有必要禁用这个校验. 
因为在 1.18.2 之前, 这个校验甚至都不存在

source_string:
If true, then the render layer follows the player.
Note: This currently collapses Layer Range type ranges unfortunately
translation: 如果开启, 则渲染层跟随玩家, 但是只能跟随当前高度

source_string:
If true, then the entire schematic is always loaded at once.
If false, then only the part that is within the client's view distance is loaded.
translation: 如果启用, 那么整个投影总是同时加载. 如果为关闭, 则只加载客户端视距内的部分

source_string: When enabled, the exact block state is ignored, and only the block type needs to match
translation: 启用后, 将忽略确切的方块状态, 仅需要匹配方块类型

source_string: This forces using the fill command (instead of setblock) even for single blocks
translation: 这将会强制使用 fill 命令(而不是 setblock), 即使是单个方块

source_string:
If enabled, then block entities ae not pasted at all
via the command-based pasting in multiplayer.
This allows you to easier paste in two passes if you
want to use the NBT-restore option for inventories etc. in the second pass,
which usually requires a lot slower pasting speed/command rate.
translation:
如果启用, 则在多人游戏中通过基于命令的粘贴根本不粘贴实体方块. 
如果你想在第二遍中对箱子等方块使用 NBT-restore(NBT 迁移)选项, 
这使您可以更轻松地在第二遍中粘贴, 
然而这通常需要更慢的粘贴速度/命令速率

source_string:
If enabled, then all block entities are ignored from the fill
commands when pasting. This allows them to get pasted individually,
which is required if the NBT restore option is being used.
translation:
如果启用, 那么在使用填充命令(fill)粘贴时将忽略所有实体方块. 
这使得实体方块可以单独粘贴, 如果想要使用 NBT-restore(NBT 迁移)恢复选项, 
这是必需的

source_string:
If enabled, then the command limit is ignored when pasting
blocks with a block entity with the NBT restore option enabled.
This seems to somehow fix an issue where the NBT restore
would otherwise fail for many blocks with a low command rate.
translation:
如果启用, 则在粘贴带有启用了 NBT-restore(NBT 迁移)选项的实体方块时将忽略命令限制. 
 这似乎以某种方式解决了一个问题, 即NBT-restore(NBT 迁移)会因许多命令速率低的方块而失败

source_string: If enabled, then the Paste feature will not paste any entities
translation: 如果启用, 则粘贴功能将不会粘贴任何实体

source_string: Don't paste inventory contents when pasting a schematic
translation:
粘贴原理图时不要粘贴库存内容
(大概指箱子内物品)

source_string:
If enabled, then instead of actually pasting schematics to the world,
they are written as setblock commands into text files.
translation:
如果启用, 则不是将实际的原理图粘贴到世界, 
它们将作为 setblock 命令写入文本文件

source_string:
If enabled, then instead of only using individual /setblock commands,
the command-based Paste operation (which is used on servers)
will also try to use /fill commands for any continuous areas of the same block.
This has no effect in single player, since the mod sets the blocks directly
in the integrated server's world in and doesn't use commands at all.
translation:
如果启用了该功能, 那么粘贴时不是只使用单独的 /setblock 命令, 
而是基于命令的粘贴操作(比如在服务器后台使用)会尝试对
同一块的任何连续区域使用 /fill 命令. 这在单人游戏中没有效果, 
因为 Mod 直接在服务器的世界中设置方块, 而且根本不使用命令

source_string:
This is a temporary hack workaround to use the command-based pasting
also in single player, which allows using the render layer limited
pasting in single player, which currently doesn't work with
the direct world access pasting that single player normally uses.

Note that this will have all the same NBT data restoration
limitations that multiplayer pasting has normally.
translation:
这是一个临时的方法, 可以在单人游戏中基于命令粘贴, 
这使得在单人游戏中可以使用部分渲染层粘贴原理图, 
但这目前不适用于单人游戏通常使用的粘贴方式

source_string:
Use Servux to paste a schematic directly to the server.
This method is much faster than the traditional
command-based method, and it supports restoring
Entity NBT Data.
translation:
使用 Servux 将结构图直接粘贴到服务器上. 
这种方法比传统的基于命令的方法快得多, 
并且支持恢复实体 NBT 数据

source_string: Avoids replacing any damageable items in the hotbar
translation:
在开启简单放置后, 避免方块替换掉任何在快捷栏中
有耐久度的物品. §d例如: 打火石, 毛刷等§r

source_string:
Avoids replacing any tool items in the hotbar.

This means any items that extend the vanilla ToolItem class.
translation: 在开启简单放置后, 避免方块替换掉任何在快捷栏中的工具

source_string:
Enables the schematic world pick block hotkeys.
There is also a hotkey for toggling this option to toggle those hotkeys... o.o
translation:
启用结构图世界的拾取方块快捷键. 
还有一个快捷键可以切换此选项, 从而切换这些快捷键... o.o

source_string:
If enabled, then if the required item for the pick bloc
is not found directly in the player's inventory, but there
is a Shulker box that contains it, the Shulker Box
will be switched to the player's hand instead
translation:
如果启用, 那么如果选取方块物品没有在玩家背包找到
那么就切换出包含它的潜影盒

source_string:
The hotbar slots that are allowed to be
used for the schematic pick block
translation:
允许用于投影原理图挑选的快捷栏
(12345 指的是物品栏1-5的位置, 也就是说你物品栏1-5位置全是工具, 投影会报错)

source_string:
When enabled, the use key can only be used
when holding the correct item for the targeted position,
and the targeted position must have a missing block in the schematic
translation:
启用后, 使用键只能在手持针对目标位置的正确物品时使用, 
并且目标位置在结构图中必须是一个缺失的方块

source_string:
Whether or not the material list should
be rendered inside GUIs
translation: 材质列表是否应该在 GUI 中呈现

source_string:
Removes the timeout from the rendering worker threads.
If you get very stuttery rendering when moving around
or dealing with large schematics, try disabling this. It will however make
the schematic rendering a lot slower in some cases.
translation:
从渲染工作线程中移除超时. 
如果你在处理大型原理图的时候渲染的很不流畅, 
试着禁用它. 但是在某些情况下, 它会使原理图的渲染速度慢很多

source_string: Limit request rate for server entity data syncer
translation: 限制服务器实体数据同步器的请求速率

source_string: Automatically set the text in the sign GUIs from the schematic
translation:
该功能能在原理图的覆盖层显示投影中告示牌的内容
§d这样就不用背了捏~

source_string: The item to use as the "tool" for selections etc.
translation:
作为用于选择的工具, 虽然默认是木棍
(§3但是其实你想拿末影龙头也是可以的hhh§r)

source_string: If true, then the "tool" item can be used to control selections etc.
translation:
如果启用该选项, 那么你可以使用工具进行操作
如果你关了的话, 那它就是一根朴素的木棍
§6如果你没有改默认工具的话——ZMDF§r

source_string:
A Data Components-aware version of toolItem.
Set to "empty" to disable.
The syntax accepted is the same as the "/give" command.
translation:
一个数据组件感知版本的[工具项目].
设置 "Empty" 以禁用.
接收与 "/give" 命令相同的语法

source_string:
Un-hides the Schematic VCS (Version Control System) menu button,
and enables the hotkey and the VCS functionality in general.
(This was called Schematic Projects before.)

In general you §6should not§r be using this feature,
unless you really know how it works and what it does.
It somewhat changes how the area selections, placements and pasting works,
in particular that there is also an area delete operation when pasting.

Basically this feature is intended for §6iterative, in-place§r design work,
and it allows you to easier create multiple versions/snapshots
of the same build, and also to switch between the versions by deleting what is
in the world first, and then pasting the next version in its place.
translation:
取消隐藏 Schematic VCS(版本控制系统)菜单按钮, 
并启用热键和 VCS 功能. (这之前被称为原理图项目. )

一般来说, 你不应该使用这个功能, 
除非你真的知道它是如何工作的. 
它在一定程度上改变了区域选择、放置和粘贴的工作方式, 
特别是在粘贴时还存在一个区域删除操作. 

基本上, 这个功能是为更新、修改原理图而设计的, 
它允许你更容易地为同一版本原理图创建多个版本/快照, 
也可以通过先删除当前版本, 
然后粘贴下一个版本来在不同版本之间切换
该选项可以切换是否显示选区的边框
该选项可以切换是否显示投影区域的边框

source_string: Main rendering toggle option. Enables/disables ALL mod rendering.
translation: 主渲染切换选项, 该选项可切换所有渲染是否开启

source_string:
Enables schematic block rendering.
Disabling this allows you to only see the color overlay
translation:
该选项可以切换是否在投影内显示方块的贴图
(开启后可以更好辨识出投影缺失的是什么方块)

source_string:
Enables schematic fluid rendering.
Disabling this allows you to see the blocks and overlays easier.
This also culls the overlay where the Fluid was.
translation:
Enables schematic fluid rendering.
Disabling this allows you to see the blocks and overlays easier.
This also culls the overlay where the Fluid was.

source_string:
The main toggle option for the schematic
block overlay rendering
translation:
该选项可以切换是否在投影内使用边框表示未放置的方块
未被放置的方块虽然没有边框, 但是仍可以显示(显示状态由透明度决定)

source_string: Enable rendering the schematic and overlay
translation: 该选项可以切换是否显示投影原理图

source_string:
Maximum Schematic World Rendering Thread Size
This will directly effect overall multi-threaded performance

§6USE WITH CAUTION!! This will only take effect
§6after you leave the game, and rejoin.
translation:
最大结构图世界渲染线程大小
这将直接影响整体多线程性能

§6请谨慎使用! ! 此设置只会在您退出游戏并重新加入后生效

source_string:
The alpha value of the ghost blocks,
when rendering them as translucent.
§6Note: §7You also need to enable the translucent rendering separately,
using the 'renderBlocksAsTranslucent' option!
translation:
虚影方块的 alpha 值, 当它们渲染为半透明时
§6注意: §7您还需要单独启用§6[方块半透明化]§f选项!

source_string:
If enabled, then any fluid blocks are ignored as "extra blocks"
and as "wrong blocks", ie. where the schematic has air or other blocks.
Basically this makes building stuff under water a whole lot less annoying.
Note: You will most likely also want to enable the 'renderCollidingSchematicBlocks'
option at the same time, to allow the blocks to get rendered inside fluids.
translation:
如果启用该选项, 原理图中如果有空气或其他块, 
那么任何的「额外块」或「错误块」的液体将被忽略. 
基本上, 这使得在水下建造东西少了很多麻烦. 
注意:你很可能还得同时启用§6[渲染重叠块]§f, 以允许块在流体中渲染

source_string:
If enabled, then the adjacent/touching inner sides
for the block overlays are removed/not rendered
translation:
如果启用, 可以使得投影内方块接触的侧面不被显示
有两个优点
-1. 首先减少了投影的渲染工作量
-2. 在投影内部时, 内部的杂色会变淡
(§6虽然默认是关闭但建议开启-ZMDF§r)

source_string: The alpha value of the sub-region boxes' side
translation: 子区域边框的透明度(§2没有找到实际的功能体现——ZMDF§r)

source_string:
If enabled, then the area selection boxes will
have their side quads rendered
translation: 该选项可以选择是否开启选区边框显示(渲染)

source_string:
If enabled, then the schematics are rendered
using translucent "ghost blocks"
translation:
如果启用该选项, 投影原理图内的方块展示将由
不透明变为半透明状态

source_string:
If enabled, then blocks in the schematics are rendered
also when there is already a (wrong) block in the client world.
Probably mostly useful when trying to build
something where there are snow layers or water in the way.
translation:
如果启用该选项, 那么当客户端世界中存在错误的方块时
投影原理图内的方块仍然会进行显示
当你试图在一些有水或着雪层的地方建造时. 
(就是无视雪片与流动液体的意思, 大概)

source_string:
Render connecting lines between subsequent verifier highlight box corners.
This was a rendering bug that some people experienced, but at least some players
liked it and requested for it to stay, so this options "restores" it
translation:
启用该选项时, 当用户在使用验证器验证原理图是否正确后, 
当你在验证器内选中了错误方块
错误方块间会有连线. 
(这个功能有部分bug, 但是作者应该是为了方便错误方块的定位)

source_string:
If enabled, then the error markers in the Schematic Verifier
will have (translucent) sides rendered instead of just the outline
translation:
关闭该选项时, 用户在使用验证器验证原理图是否正确后, 
当你在验证器内选中了错误方块
它的展示方式将不仅仅标明颜色, 
还会标明它的贴图(便于用户知道错误的方块是什么)

source_string:
If enabled, then the placed schematic sub-region boxes
will have their side quads rendered
translation:
如果启用该选项, 则放置区域会显示侧面颜色
(§6就是侧面将显示默认的选区颜色, 影响视线——ZMDF§r)

source_string:
If enabled, then an enclosing box is rendered around
all the sub-regions in a schematic (placement)
translation: 如果启用, 则在投影中的所有子区域周围呈现一个封闭框

source_string:
If enabled, then the enclosing box around
a schematic placement will have its side quads rendered
translation: 如果启用, 则在投影中的所有子区域周围的封闭框会显示一个完整的面

source_string:
If enabled, then the model sides are also rendered
for inner sides in the translucent mode
translation:
如果启用该选项, 则投影内所有方块的面将成为透明
(这将使得你可以看透很多方块, 嗯没错, 看透)

source_string:
Enables rendering a wire frame outline for
the schematic block overlay
translation: 如果启用该选项, 投影原理图方块边框的框线将会显示

source_string:
Enables Translucent Sorting for
the schematic block overlay
translation: 启用结构方块覆盖层的透明排序功能

source_string:
Enables rendering translucent boxes/sides for
the schematic block overlay
translation: 如果启用该选项, 投影原理图方块的块面将会显示

source_string:
If enabled, then the schematic overlay will use the
block model quads/vertices instead of the
traditional full block overlay
translation:
如果启用, 那么原理图覆盖将使用块模型的四块/顶点, 而不是传统的全块覆盖
(主要针对不完整方块)

source_string:
If enabled, then the schematic overlay will use the
block model quads/vertices instead of the
traditional full block overlay
translation:
如果启用, 结构覆盖层将使用方块模型的四边形/顶点, 
而不是传统的完整方块覆盖层

source_string: The line width of the block (model) outlines
translation: 投影原理图当中方块轮廓线的宽度设置

source_string:
The line width of the block (model) outlines,
when the overlay is rendered through blocks
translation: 投影原理图当中透视方块轮廓线的宽度设置

source_string:
If enabled, then the schematic overlay will be rendered
through blocks. This is probably only useful once you are
finished building and want to see any errors easier
translation:
如果启用, 那么原理图将可透视观察. 
这可能只在您完成构建并希望更容易地看到任何错误时才有用

source_string: Enables the schematic overlay for extra blocks
translation: 当开启了原理图透视后, 开启该选项将显示多余的方块

source_string: Enables the schematic overlay for missing blocks
translation: 当开启了原理图透视后, 开启该选项将显示缺失的方块

source_string: Enables the schematic overlay for wrong blocks
translation: 当开启了原理图透视后, 开启该选项将显示错误的方块

source_string: Enables the schematic overlay for wrong states
translation: 当开启了原理图透视后, 开启该选项将显示错位的方块

source_string:
Forces using blocks models for everything in the Schematic Verifier
result list. Normally item models are used for anything
that has an item, and block models are only used for blocks
that don't have an item, plus for Flower Pots to see the contained item.
translation:
强制在原理图验证的结果列表中为所有内容使用方块模型, 
对于含有有物品的方块会使用物品模型, 
没有对应物品的方块会使用方块模型, 
以及用于查看花盆中的植物

source_string: The alignment of the block info lines overlay
translation: 方块信息弹窗的显示位置

source_string: The alignment of the Block Info Overlay
translation: 方块信息在屏幕位置调整的选项

source_string:
The alignment of the "Info HUD",
used for the Material List, Schematic Verifier mismatch positions etc.
translation:
材料信息位置的调整
(其实和材料有关的 HUD 显示都是这玩意)

source_string: The alignment of the "tool HUD", when holding the configured "tool"
translation: 当你使用木棍时, 将工具的 HUD 选择区域定位与该位置

source_string:
If enabled, then MiniHUD-style block info overlay
is rendered for the looked-at block
translation:
如果开启该功能, MiniHUD 将显示方块信息
默认位于屏幕右上角

source_string: The font scale for the block info lines
translation: 默认在右上角的方块信息的字体大小控制

source_string: The x offset of the block info lines from the selected edge
translation: 方块信息与边框的横向偏移量(横向距离)

source_string: The y offset of the block info lines from the selected edge
translation: 方块信息与边框的纵向偏移量(纵向距离)

source_string: The y offset of the block info overlay from the selected edge
translation: 方块信息弹窗的纵向偏移量

source_string:
Enable Block Info Overlay rendering to show info
about the looked-at block or verifier error marker,
while holding the 'renderInfoOverlay' key
translation:
启用方块信息弹窗, 其功能为图形显示方块贴图
主要是可以在投影放错时, 为你提供投影原本方块的信息

source_string: The maximum number of info lines to show on the HUD at once
The X offset of the Info HUD from the screen edge
translation: 工具 HUD 与边框的纵向偏移量(纵向距离)

source_string: The Y offset of the Info HUD from the screen edge
translation: 材料 HUD 与边框的纵向偏移量(纵向距离)

source_string: Scale factor for the generic Info HUD text

When enabled, the Block Info Overlay and Block Info Lines
will be able to ray trace to fluid blocks instead of going through them
translation:
启用后, 方块信息叠加时
将能够焦点定位到流体块而不是穿过它们

source_string:
The maximum number of items to show on
the Material List Info HUD at once
translation: 控制材料 HUD 的最大行数

source_string: Scale factor for the Material List Info HUD
translation: 控制材料 HUD 的缩放大小

source_string:
Enable a status info HUD renderer,
which renders a few bits of status info, such as
the current layer mode and renderers enabled state
translation:
启用状态信息的显示, 该显示内容默认位于左下角
其内容包含当前渲染层的状态与层数
当然, 这是在手持非木棍的情况下显示的

source_string:
Allow automatically momentarily enabling the status info HUD "when needed",
for example when creating a placement and having rendering disabled
translation:
允许自动暂时开启状态信息 HUD 比如当需要时, 
例如当创建一个位置或者渲染禁用时

source_string: The X offset of the Info HUD from the screen edge
translation: 信息 HUD 相对于屏幕边缘的 X 轴偏移量

source_string: The Y offset of the Info HUD from the screen edge
translation: 信息 HUD 相对于屏幕边缘的 Y 轴偏移量

source_string: Scale factor for the Tool HUD text
translation: 控制工具 HUD 的文本缩放大小

source_string: The alpha value of the error marker box sides
translation:
在打开原理图验证程序对当前放置进行验证后, 
点击验证当中出现问题的方块, 
错误的方块将在透视状态下所产生的亮度显示

source_string:
The maximum number of mismatched positions to render
at once in the Schematic Verifier overlay.
translation:
在打开原理图验证程序对当前放置进行验证后, 
点击验证当中出现问题的方块, 
错误的方块在透视状态下的最大数量显示

source_string: Enable Schematic Verifier marker overlay rendering

Should the warning message about being in a layer mode
or having some of the rendering options disabled
be shown when loading a new schematic
or creating a new placement
translation:
当加载一个新的原理图或创建一个新的位置时, 
是否应该显示关于该层的一些警告消息

source_string: The color of the area selection boxes, when they are unselected
translation: 选区未被选中时边框的颜色

source_string: The highlight color for the item of the looked at block
translation: 在物品栏中高亮显示目标方块的颜色

source_string: The color of the item count text in the Material List info HUD
translation: 材料列表开启 HUD 后的游戏内材料数量的颜色

source_string: The color of Schematic Rebuild mode's break or place blocks selector overlay
translation:
在重建原理图模式的批量删除当中, 
在方向选择器上的指示器颜色

source_string: The color of Schematic Rebuild mode's break all blocks except targeted selector overlay
translation: 在重建原理图模式当中, 选择保留方块的指示器颜色

source_string: The color of Schematic Rebuild mode's replace selector overlay
translation:
在重建原理图模式的批量替换当中, 
在方向选择器上的指示器颜色

source_string: The color of the blocks overlay for extra blocks
translation: 多余方块在投影内显示的颜色

source_string: The color of the blocks overlay for missing blocks
translation: 缺失方块在投影内显示的颜色

source_string: The color of the blocks overlay for wrong blocks
translation: 错误方块在投影内显示的颜色

source_string: The color of the blocks overlay for wrong block states
translation: 方块方向错误在投影内显示的颜色

source_string: Add a new selection box (position 1) here
translation: 在当前位置添加一个新的选区(位置 1)

source_string:
Quickly clone the current area selection.
This basically just creates an in-memory-only schematic,
and then creates a placement of that schematic and selects it,
and also switches the tool mode to the Paste mode.
translation:
快速克隆当前选定的区域, 基本上是创建了一个储存中的原理图
然后在当前位置创建一个原理图并选择它, 并将工具模式切换为粘贴

source_string: When the easyPlaceMode is enabled, this key is used for placing the blocks
translation: 当启用简单放置时, 此键用于放置方块

source_string: Allows quickly toggling on/off the Easy Place mode
translation: 允许玩家快速的切换简单放置的模式

source_string:
Execute the currently selected tool operation with the
current selection or placement in the Fill, Replace,
Paste Schematic etc. modes
translation:
在填充、替换、粘贴原理图等模式中, 
以当前选择模式或放置方式执行当前选择的工具操作

source_string:
Inverts the schematic/ghost block rendering status
while this keybind is held down
translation: 当按住该按键后, 对投影的方块渲染效果是否开启进行调整

source_string: Inverts the Overlay rendering status while this keybind is held down
translation: 当按住该按键后, 对投影的线框渲染效果是否开启进行调整

source_string: Cycle the rendering mode (all, layers) forward
translation: 切换为下一个渲染模式

source_string: Cycle the rendering mode (all, layers) backwards
translation: 切换为上一个渲染模式

source_string: Move the rendered layer selection up
translation: 将渲染的图层向上移动一层

source_string: Move the rendered layer selection down
translation: 将渲染的图层向下移动一层

source_string: Set the Render Layer to the player's current position
translation: 将渲染层的初始位置设定为玩家当前位置

source_string:
Nudge the current selection in the "negative" direction
This is basically the same as mouse wheel down
with the Nudge modifier pressed
translation: 向面向方向前移选区位置, 其效果与 Alt + 鼠标滚轮效果类似

source_string:
Nudge the current selection in the "positive" direction
This is basically the same as mouse wheel up
with the Nudge modifier pressed
translation: 向面向方向后移选区位置, 其效果与 Alt + 鼠标滚轮效果类似

source_string: Move the entire current selection here
translation: 移动整个选区至玩家所在的当前位置

source_string: Open the Area Settings GUI for the currently selected area
translation: 打开当前选区的区域设置 GUI 界面
打开原理图加载的 GUI 界面

source_string:
Open the Material List GUI for the currently
selected schematic placement
translation: 打开当前选择的投影材料列表 GUI

source_string:
Open the Placement Settings GUI for the currently
selected placement or sub-region
translation: 打开当前选区或其子区域的配置原理图放置 GUI
打开管理原理图放置 GUI
打开原理图工程文件夹 GUI

source_string:
Open the Schematic Verifier GUI for the currently

source_string:
(This was called Schematic Projects before.)
In general you §6should not§r be using this feature,
unless you really know how it works and what it does.
It somewhat changes how the area selections, placements and pasting works,
in particular that there is also an area delete operation when pasting.

Basically this feature is intended for §6iterative, in-place§r design work,
and it allows you to easier create multiple versions/snapshots
of the same build, and also to switch between the versions by deleting what is
in the world first, and then pasting the next version in its place.
translation:
(这个功能之前叫做 Schematic Projects)
一般来说, 除非你确实了解它的工作原理和功能, 否则你§6不应该§r使用这个功能. 
它在某种程度上改变了区域选择、放置和粘贴的工作方式, 尤其是在粘贴时还有一个区域删除操作. 

基本上,这个功能是为了§6迭代、就地§r设计工作而设计的, 它可以让你更容易创建同一建筑的多个版本/快照, 并且通过先删除世界中的内容, 然后在其位置粘贴下一个版本来切换版本

source_string: Do you want to delete the file '%s'?

Do you want to delete the "last affected" area?
This will delete whatever blocks and entities are within the area that the project manager last placed to the world, or last saved as a version. (Basically the "last seen affected area", such that if you were to cycle versions, it would not leave blocks behind from the previous version.)
translation:
是否删除"上次受影响"的区域? 
这将删除这个工程管理器上次放置在世界上的, 或者上次保存为一个版本文件的区域中任何方块实体
(基本上是"最后一次看到受影响的区域", 这样如果你要循环版本, 它就不会留下以前版本的方块)

source_string:
Do you want to place this version to the world?
It will delete whatever blocks are within the area that the project manager last placed to the world, or last saved as a version. (Basically the "last seen affected area", such that if you were to cycle versions, it would not leave blocks behind from the previous version.)
translation:
你想把这个版本放到世界吗?
这将删除项目管理器最后放置到世界的区域内的任何方块和实体,或最后保存为版本. (基本上 \"最后见过受影响的区域\", 这样,如果你要循环版本,它不会留下以前版本的方块)

source_string:
Warning: When you directly load non-Litematica schematics, the created placements won't be persistent.
Also if you have to load the schematic many times, then the schematic type conversion lag spike (for large schematics) will happen each time you load it.

It is therefore recommended to either import the schematic and save it in the Litematica format via the Schematic Manager menu, or better yet, paste the original schematic into a temporary world using MCEdit or the Paste mode in Litematica, and then make a new Litematica schematic from that, preferably using multiple sub-regions to tightly capture the build, where applicable.
translation:
警告: 直接加载非Litematica原理图时, 创建的展示位置不会持久. 
此外, 如果您必须多次加载原理图, 那么每次加载时都会发生原理图类型转换滞后尖峰(对于大型原理图). 

因此, 建议导入原理图并通过原理图管理器菜单以Litematica格式保存, 或者更好的是, 使用MCEdit或Litematica中的粘贴模式将原始原理图粘贴到临时世界中, 然后制作新的Litematica原理图 从那里开始, 在适用的情况下, 最好使用多个子区域来紧密捕获构建

source_string: The targeted placement is currently not selected. The Replace All hotkey only works on the currently selected sub-region(s) of the placement you click on. So to replace the blocks in only one sub-region, select that sub-region. To replace in the entire schematic (all sun-regions), select the entire placement and not a sub-region of it. The blocks are also only replaced within the area limited by the current Render Layers setting.
translation: 目前未选择目标展示位置. "全部替换"热键仅适用于您单击的放置的当前选定子区域. 因此, 要仅替换一个子区域中的块, 请选择该子区域. 要替换整个原理图(所有太阳区域), 请选择整个位置而不是其子区域.  这些块也仅在当前"渲染层"设置限制的区域内被替换

source_string: Warning: The Schematic Version Control System is currently hidden. In general you should NOT use this, unless you really know how it works and changes some of the mod behavior. It is meant for iteratire, in-place design work, where flipping between different versions of the build in-place (= deleting and replacing the previous version) is needed. If you want to use it, then enable the option Generic -> unhideSchematicVCS
translation:
警告: 原理图版本控制系统当前处于隐藏状态. 
一般来说, 你不应该使用它, 除非你真的知道它是如何工作的并改变了一些 mod 行为. 
如果您想使用它, 请启用选项 [通用] -> [不隐藏原理图版本控制系统]
